header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Church, designing signs, arts festival, fund raising, banking and money, dog in car, asking for lift, bell ringing, fencing, televisions, ariel falling down
header.activity: Came for a cup of tea
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, requesting, making arrangements
